item.title: knitr in a knutshell tutorial
item.description: I spent a lot of time this week writing a short tutorial on knitr: knitr in a knutshell. This is my third little tutorial. (The previous ones were a git/github guide and a minimal make tutorial.) I’m pleased with these tutorials. In learning new computing skills, it can be hard to get started. My goal was to provide the initial motivation and orientation, and then links to other resources. I think they are effective in that regard.
